feed.title: Follow-up regarding Motion to Activate BIP 3

entry.title: Follow-up regarding Motion to Activate BIP 3
entry.summary: The message from Bryan Bishop on the "Bitcoin Development Mailing List" provides a positive review of the latest Bitcoin Improvement Proposal (BIP), indicating a noticeable improvement over BIP2. Bishop highlights that the proposal has undergone significant refinement and believes that it is ready for adoption, having had ample time for any objections to be raised. He explicitly states his full support for the proposal's activation, emphasizing its readiness and the community's opportunity to voice concerns. This endorsement suggests a consensus or at least strong support within the community for moving forward with the implementation of the latest improvements to the Bitcoin protocol.
